abstract: Tells your app to print available content.
overview:
## Discussion

Implement this method on the responder responsible for printing the contents of the window scene; for instance, the root view controller of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindow]. In your implementation, prepare the print job and present an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController] to show a Print dialog.

If your app includes the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSupportsPrintCommand] key in its `Info.plist` file, people can print from your app using the keyboard shortcut Command-P, which calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/printContent(_:)]. You can also set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/printContent(_:)] as the action on other print-related controls such as a print button on a toolbar.

For more information about printing from your app, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/printing].

# printContent(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells your app to print available content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func printContent(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object calling this method.

## Discussion

Implement this method on the responder responsible for printing the contents of the window scene; for instance, the root view controller of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindow]. In your implementation, prepare the print job and present an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController] to show a Print dialog.



If your app includes the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSupportsPrintCommand] key in its `Info.plist` file, people can print from your app using the keyboard shortcut Command-P, which calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/printContent(_:)]. You can also set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponderStandardEditActions/printContent(_:)] as the action on other print-related controls such as a print button on a toolbar.

For more information about printing from your app, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/printing].
title: printContent(_:)
